data.name: Flatcraft
data.detailed_description:
JOIN OUR COMMUNITY


Join our discord server where you can find the latest news, participate in polls,
show off your builds, FAQ and more!

Discord: https://discord.gg/QjHsZbkK3r


About the Game

The year is 1993...

A then mostly unknown Swedish game studio releases a sandbox game where the
world is your canvas. Break every block, build anything you want, and
explore an infinite world alongside friends!


[Remider: Blowing on the cartridge to remove dust does not work!]

Uncover neglected strongholds, temples, and mineshafts, explore multiple foreign dimensions
such as the nether, and set out on a grand adventure to slay the ender dragon.



Experience unique challenges such as skyblock, where your objective is to prosper on
a desolate floating island with very limited resources.

Features:

  • AN INFINITE WORLD with several biomes, animals, and monsters

  • MULTIPLAYER allows you to invite your friends to your world and play together

  • STRUCTURES such as dungeons, strongholds, mineshafts, and caves litter the world,
    ready for you to explore them.

  • 8-BIT VISUALS fresh out of the oven from 1993.

  • SKYBLOCK, complete the game with just a bucket of lava and water on a
    desolate grass island.

  • ONGOING DEVELOPMENT, visit the discord server for the latest news about development
    and have a say about features in polls. Have a look at the roadmap for some additional
    intel about the future of the game.

data.short_description: An unreleased 1990s edition of the world's most famous block game. Explore this retro sandbox world with familiar mechanics such as crafting, building, and mining.
